title: Crypto Tracker
description: Developed a Python-based Personal Finance Tracker using Pandas to import, categorize, and analyze transactions,visualize spending patterns, and generate summary reports..

title: AI Image Analyzer
description: Developed an AI image analayzer utilizing react for the frontend and Next Jsor the backend integrating the Open AI API for the image processing. Created a dynamic, user-friendly interface with real time image analysis and visual feedback.

title: Sentiment Analysis
description: Developed a pyhton-based sentiment analysis tool using NLP techniques, analying twitter data to classify posts and visualizesentiment trends for actionable insights.
